Reviews.Title: Don't fall for this one!!!!
Reviews.Author: JM!
Reviews.Content: Be careful, the store that sold me this E-C-R or something store is a new seller, scammer. Posts all the specs of the real HTC s720E which holds a quad-core 1.5GHz processor, nvidia Tegra3 chipset and 32GB. When he sends it, it is this really weird clone, although I admit that the retina display is quite real, certain things are just not right, for example, the fact that the android version in it is 4.0.4 and is not upgradeable in this clone. Additionally, the phone came with no IMEI, yes NO IMEI!!! Therefore the phone could not be put in a network. I got a pretty clone of a paperweight. Again, STAY AWAY FROM THIS SELLER OR HIS PRODUCTS!

Reviews.Title: Great phone.. Loving it
Reviews.Author: M. Al Banna "Lucky"
Reviews.Content: So i bought the HTC One X after changing from HTC Incredible S. and really, that's a big jump in clarity, speed and performance. let's make this quick but i won't mention the actual specs figures coz it's all over the net anyway, just personal use to knw how it is.Design: Fits perfect in the hand unless ur hands are small. The feel of the cover on the back is great, doesnt leave finger print. I got the white one and the HTC logo is in metal which is sexy. many of my friends checked out the phone, and loved the design. very light.Screen: amazing wide screen, great for many tasks like web browsing, gaming...etc. the feel of the glass of the screen is SO soft that ur fingers will slide on the screen (ull knw wt i mean whn u use it). very bright (though i keep it on low brightness for better battery life and better vision for health LOL, no really) coz it is actually reallly bright at maz level.Performance: latest android installed and many apps and the phone does not lag. still flip through the screens and switch between apps easily without lagging. tried opening few apps and web browsing and the phone works fine.Phone Calls: called friends and tested the voice clarity, they all said ur voice is really clear and i can hear them clear as well. tested the ear phones that comes with it (they are not beats ear phone and also not in-ear buds. just regular HTC ear phone) used it for around 4-5 days, and yes, the other party can hear me just perfect, thu it does not stay on ur ears very well (kinda loose bcoz its not ear buds) but they do the job and clearly.Camera: 8 mp but it is okay, i wouldnt say its the best n greatest, but it is just good and clear and best about it is the snap shots, if u wud like to take few pics at few seconds, thats the one.Battery: i heard people complaining about the battery and a new software is out n all that. i didn't get any issue with bad battery probably coz that i got the phone after the release of the new tweak. bcoz i actually got a msg whn i turned on the phone for the first time, saying please update the software. but im not sure wt was that software all about. anyway, the battery is alright and not that bad as i read. i charge it once a day only with average use, 1 hour web browsing, around 1 n half hour phone call, 30 min gaming, few music tracks. quiet an average use (with low screen brightness, which is not that low by the way).Extra's: built in Face unlock phone, so u dont need to enter a number to unlock ur phone, just keep ur face there and the front facing camera will detect and Unlock. dont worry, u can take as many pics as u want to recognize u, in light, in dark, with hat, with glasses, what ever so the camera can recognize u in different looks. HTC sense 4 is pretty awesome. The keyboard, as always (and thats why i love HTC) to type numbers and charachters, u can just long press on the specific character and there u go (instead of changing the page to press a number then back again to the letters page)what i didnt like about it (though i knew it and bought it anyway) the battery cant be changed and the micro SD is not external. internal Memory and battery. and the power button is on the top, for a big screen i think power button should be on the side like samsung phone coz on the top u really have to stretch ur finger, but that's just a personal opinion.that's all i cud think at the moment, please let me know if u have any Q's

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone that stopped working in 6 months
Reviews.Author: Mayuresh G.
Reviews.Content: The HTC One X was a wonderful phone when I bought it from Amazon. However, the phone just stopped working within 6 months from buying it on Amazon.I tried to charge the battery - almost did everything that I could but the phone just does not come up. Since it is sold as a no warranty phone, I don't know what options I have now.I would definitely not recommend this phone - only buy it if it comes with Warranty.

Reviews.Title: Best Android Handset Available!
Reviews.Author: SagarCellGuru
Reviews.Content: This phone has a gorgeous screen, thin/light profile, and a very smooth, lag/bug-free ICS OS.I purchased this from Amazon.com as the seller, and it looks like they sourced the product from India as it was preloaded with Bollywood Hungama and the URL on the box was htc.com/in.It came with the Quad-Core Tegra 3 global unlocked phone, wide box, white headphones (non-Beats), an Indian plug with US adapter, and a USB cable.It is the first phone I purchased that successfully lured me away from Windows Phone 7.5.

Reviews.Title: Incompetent Cheating company!!! Unlocked phones should work on ALL carriers not on some of them!!!
Reviews.Author: Abou-Zeid
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and nothing said in the phone page that this phone is JUST for AT&T; and it won't work fine on t-mobile. I bought the phone and started to use it but my data package (Internet) was NOT working at all. The WiFi was working, but the data package was not working. I returned the phone on my expense and it cost me $26.61. They deducted $25.00 from the price I paid for the phone!!! I emailed them and said that it is not my fault that the phone is defected!! They said it's not defected because we tried it and it works!! I said I went to t-mobile themselves and they checked all the APN settings and they said it's fine, but still the phone hasn't worked. They said this phone is not unlocked properly!! I told them I don't buy an UNLOCKED phone so that it works on some carriers and not on others!!! An UNLOCKED phone should work on all carriers and everywhere!! Then why am I paying the whole retail price if I won't have a phone that won't work fine on all carriers!! The guy I email from this company kept saying that they tried this phone on AT&T; network and it works fine!!! I don't use AT&T; and I want it to work on t-mobile not AT&T;!!Bottom line, they just stole $25.00 form the price of the phone and made easy profit from me and most probably others by deceiving the customers and putting untrue information about their products and then you return it (on your expense) and they take the restocking fee and the phone is back to them and they resell it again and again!!!

Reviews.Title: Best Android phone Its The King! of all
Reviews.Author: Doris.ec
Reviews.Content: Really nice phone more than expected for that price love it and that is all that I have to say about this product! Its the king!!!!

Reviews.Title: NOT what It shows
Reviews.Author: Sakshi Chhabra
Reviews.Content: It doesnt work well internationally and it does carry a carrier logo which they say they dont .. I am not satisfied with this purchase at all ..

Reviews.Title: Sweet Phone
Reviews.Author: W. Kerr "FrasMan"
Reviews.Content: Great phone. The only issue I had was the wi-fi problem that arose after I sat with the phone in my back pocket.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: This is the phone I wanted for a long time, I found a good deal and do not hesitate to buy it, I could not be more happy with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Quad Core - International Version... loving it!
Reviews.Author: Franco Borsani
Reviews.Content: I have been reading that there is quite a confusion about the One X having the Tegra 3 or a dual-core processor.  I purchase this phone because I have come to Panama (Central America) and will be using it here, so I asked the seller about it being the International version one unlocked, it has no AT&T; logo on it, it has the Tegra 3 processor on it and all the options of the International version.  I just swap my SIM card in , and it was ready to use... IMMEDIATELY! No blocks, no options displeasure and it is completely updateable to the latest Android OS.I love the device itself, solid built (as expected from HTC), no too heavy but not too light, ultra fast... In one word: EXCELLENT.  I received the item from the seller even before than expected, so that was a good surprise as well.  I really recommend the HTC One X and I recommend buying it from FGS Trading which is the one I used.  This is the International 32GB Tegra 3 Version (no At&T; logo)

Reviews.Title: I use it for 6 month
Reviews.Author: Marcos Pelegrin
Reviews.Content: I use it for 6 month and later the screen die, i send it to warranty and when they return the phone the back case was broken, the imei was change and the software also change, in fact, i think they send me another phone... HTC is a really bad company... never again.

Reviews.Title: HELP ME THIS CELL IS UNLOCKED WORLDWIDE GSM,2G,3G MOVISTAR ECUADOR
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: SOMEONE CAN HELP METHIS CELL IS UNLOCKED FOR WORLDWIDE (ECUADOR)IN ALL BANDS 3G 2G GSM HSPDAPLEASE HELP METHANKS

Reviews.Title: Brilliant!
Reviews.Author: fadder8
Reviews.Content: One of the best phones available today! it feels very premium in the hand, the display is the best ive ever seen on a phone, forget all the AMOLED's from the S3 or Note or galaxy nexus, it is simply the best!

Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: Rafael Cermeño
Reviews.Content: I have had several phones of this brand and all have been excellent just what we wanted, things definitely got better but nothing to envy Samsug S3 G

Reviews.Title: JUST LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Rebecka Fenley
Reviews.Content: awesome, i really like it, and this is the universal model, so now im using in Qatar, but in weeks i'll be using in Brasil.

Reviews.Title: Very good quality product
Reviews.Author: Diego Morales
Reviews.Content: Buy from FGS Trading an "almost new" One X HTC s720e, really came "almost new" in its original packaging, is unnoticed if someone had used. An excellent seller, very fast delivery, sell what it promises.4-core processor is very fast, I preferred it before the local version (U.S.) 2 core with LTE because even in my country (CHILE) do not have 4G in that band and performance looked good, my phone is very fast.1GB memory I think is enough, never feel "lag" or a "freezing" of the phone, to complete the memory (32Gb) is a considerable space and very comfortable.Regarding the operating system, was updated via the 3G network to "Jelly Bean" so that I have the latest version of android and for my taste, HTC has done a very good customization.The size is a bit smaller than Samsung Galaxy S3 and its contours are very perfect.The photographic level is impressive, you can take lots of pictures in burst mode, you can record a video and at the same time to taking pictures, or you can even take pictures after recording the video, I think the quality of the photos as much of the videos is very high.I am very happy with my HTC, undoubtedly, my next purchase will be its big brother, the HTC One X (plus) next year, once the price starts to drop.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Phone and even better with Jelly Bean 4.1
Reviews.Author: Andres Pacheco Lopez
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone a couple of weeks ago and my first thought is : Amazing.The screen is amazing, in my opinion even better than the Samsung Galaxy s3's amoled screen.The text is sharp and the images are clear and crisp. Its amazing.As it came with a quadcore processor, the phone is not laggy at all. I have not seen even one lag in my 2 week use of this phone.My mother has a Samsung Galaxy S3 and it has proven more laggy than my HTC One X.The Jelly Bean update is amazing on this phone. If there was any trouble with battery life or lag, Jelly Bean completely eliminates it.Project Butter works amazing with the Global Version's quadcore. And battery life has been improved significantly with its power saver option.I can get a solid 15 hours straight of normal use. And while watching a complete movie with full brightness it barely drained the battery by 15%.My only complain about the phone has to do with multitasking, some of the apps refresh when you switch back and forth making it a little bit annoying when web browsing or working on documents.After everything this phone is amazing and would recommend it over the Samsung Galaxy S3. But that is my personal opinion.

Reviews.Title: One of the greatest phones out there.
Reviews.Author: Yasin
Reviews.Content: This is one of my favorite phones. It has the best display out there. Here is my breakdown of the phone:Pros:Screen: This phone has one of the best screens on any phone. It destroys the screen on any latest phone including the Samsung Galaxy S3, iPhone 5, and many others. The colors on the screen look very natural unlike the cartoon colors on the Samsung Galaxy S3.Speed & fluidity:The Quad Core Tegra 3 processor makes the phone very fluid and fast. Although the phone takes a while to boot after that the phone will run very fast. The launcher is very smooth and switching between home-screens there is not any lag even with many widgets.Sense 4:Sense 4 is a huge improved compared to the previous versions of sense. No longer is it extremely bloated and confusing. Sense 4 is very simple and straight to the point.Cons:No microSD card:Many people need a micro SD card to make it easier to transfer data from their old phone.Battery Life:The battery will last me half a day before I have to charge it again. Compared to many flagship this phone does not have good battery life.Mutitaksing: Sense 4 stops many apps that run in the background. It is very aggressive and sometimes ends many important apps.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone
Reviews.Author: P. Ragoobar
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent phone.  It has a wonderful screen - comparable to the iPhone.  The operating system is excellent.  Apps work flawlessly. Everything works smoothly and intuitively.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: A beautiful phone.. Fast! Better than Iphone!  I bought this for the quad core processor.  It is in my humble opinion this is the best phone on the market right now. 7/18/2012

Reviews.Title: HTC One X - Review
Reviews.Author: Andrei
Reviews.Content: This is the BEST android smarthphone avaible in the market. Its 4 cores can run everything in Google Play, HD Videos and much more. The screen is perfect and it doesnt take any dirty of fingers touching it. Perfect camera and video capture in 720p. This phone is better then the Samsung Galaxy S3 for obvius reasons like the Screen, Beats Audio Integration (not only with beats headphones, the normal one turn into beats), building quality and finaly, is an HTC!!!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic phone!  (Goodbye iPhone!)
Reviews.Author: Food Fan
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this phone, and my colleagues think it's great too.Why I like this phone so much:32 GB memory for unlocked international version (compared to U.S. AT&T;'s 16 GB, which is very limited given there isn't an external SD card)Thin and lightEasy to use User InterfaceBig, Beautiful screen resolution & colorCamera if fast, sharp, can add auto-effectsQuick to upload photos to Twitter, Facebook, etcComes with Dropbox integration to easily upload photos and other filesOption to merge friends' Contact info from Gmail, Facebook, Linkedin etcOption to customize every app setting and home screen iconsTask manager can easily close all appsConvenient buttons to quickly turn on/off wifi, bluetooth, etcWifi Hotspot & tetheringFile managerfor more reviews check out the Black version:HTC One X S720E with Beats Audio Unlocked GSM Android SmartPhone - International Version, No Warranty (Black)p.s. the add-on app that I've found to be very useful is the "A.I. type Keyboard"

Reviews.Title: bad review
Reviews.Author: LIDOR
Reviews.Content: the internet doesnt work on the signle in my area, there are no details on the internet signle, like its international, i want my money back.

Reviews.Title: Description is not correct
Reviews.Author: Maxim
Reviews.Content: HTC one X is good phone. Earlier i bought it from Wireless Experts, Inc. In description it says like 32 GB internal memory, but it is only 16 GB (9.93 sharp). I heard and read that If it is 32 GB - then it must be Quad Core. I read about it on htc.com. So, this version according to htc.com is USA, not Global with Quad core.I like this phone because: large screen, almost all games from play.google are working, good radius of network (not like my previous phone) and etc good thingsI dislake, because: 32 GB, not 16GB and Dual, not Quad core

Reviews.Title: jibibgb
Reviews.Author: odbo
Reviews.Content: got this phone and it died after 2 hours of use. I was so hurt i took the time out to buy this phone and i got a shitty as dead phone and they charged me for it. I tred to call then and they shut my account down.

Reviews.Title: Best phone ever!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Alvarez
Reviews.Content: This is a great smartphone..i love it.The camara is great, the apps are great, it feels great on your hands. This phone is incredible!I have had this phone for about a month now, and it just keeps getting better and better.My battery lasts for about half a day if i am constantly using it, but i think it's pretty good compared with my older smartphone (blackberry).It's just amazing!

Reviews.Title: This smartphone is the version of the Tegra 3 quad core or dual core snapdragon?
Reviews.Author: Oscar Leonardo Correa
Reviews.Content: This smartphone is the version of the Tegra 3 quad core or dual core snapdragon? This smartphone is the version of the Tegra 3 quad core or dual core snapdragon?

Reviews.Title: HTC One X 32GB Unlocked
Reviews.Author: Joel Moreno "Jo Black"
Reviews.Content: Wow! This device is just amazing! It has such a beautiful design and awesome features. I just sold my Apple iPhone 4S 16GB to emigrate to this beautiful gadget and there's no regret at all. Totally satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Is this item Asian version??
Reviews.Author: gavinyang
Reviews.Content: I want to make sure whether this item is the Asian version or the European version?? I want to buy the Asian version, Is anyone can give me some information about this?? thanks

Reviews.Title: interested in buying
Reviews.Author: Arlene Thompson
Reviews.Content: I need to know from anyone who has purchased from this buyer does the phone come with the advertised 32gb memory? The 16gb version is of no to me so i dont want to buy the wrong product

Reviews.Title: THIS IS NOT QUAD CORE AS PEOPLE ARE SAYING
Reviews.Author: BIGHAWK
Reviews.Content: I just confirmed with HTC, the One-X is only Dual-Core. Don't believe the Hype.From HTC's Web Site"Exceptional performance comes standard. Thanks to the dual-core processor with LTE, it has lightning-fast browsing, vivid picture quality, and gaming visuals"

ProductInfo.Features:
Android OS v4.0, HTC Sense, Super IPS LCD2, Touchscreen, Gorilla Glass
Beats Audio, MP4/MP3, Stereo FM Radio with RDS
8MP camera, autofocus, LED Flash, 1080p HD video recording, geo-tagging, face detection
Wi-Fi, A-GPS support, Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP
3G 850/900/1900/2100, 32 GB internal memory
ProductInfo.Name: HTC One X 32 GB Unlocked GSM Android SmartPhone - (White), with Beats Audio
